Package soc.server

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GameMessageHandler
    Server interface to handle inbound game-specific messages for a type of game; each game type has a GameMessageHandler and a GameHandler.
    SOCBoardAtServer.NewBoardProgressListener
    For layout testing, a listener to examine the new board's data at various steps of SOCBoardAtServer.makeNewBoard(SOCGameOptionSet).
    SOCServer.AuthSuccessRunnable
    Interface for asynchronous callbacks from SOCServer.authOrRejectClientUser(Connection, String, String, int, boolean, boolean, AuthSuccessRunnable) for better multithreading granularity.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GameHandler
    Server class to handle game-specific actions for a type of game and send resulting messages to clients.
    MessageData
    Store a message's contents and sender, and Runnable tasks which must run in a new thread.
    SOCBoardAtServer
    A subclass of SOCBoardLarge for the server to hold server-only per-game board state, isolate SOCBoardAtServer.makeNewBoard(SOCGameOptionSet), and simplify that parent class.
    SOCBoardAtServer.BoardFactoryAtServer
    Server-side implementation of SOCBoard.BoardFactory to create SOCBoardAtServers.
    SOCChannelList
    A class for tracking the chat channels.
    SOCChatRecentBuffer
    Ring buffer of recently said things in a game's chat window.
    SOCChatRecentBuffer.Entry
    One entry in a buffer; see constructor
    SOCForceEndTurnThread
    Force this robot's turn to end, by calling GameHandler.endGameTurnOrForce(SOCGame, int, String, Connection, boolean).
    SOCGameHandler
    Server class to handle game-specific actions and messages for the SoC game type.
    SOCGameListAtServer
    A class for creating and tracking the games; contains each game's name, game options, SOCGame object, member client Connections, and SOCChatRecentBuffer.
    SOCGameMessageHandler
    Game message handler for SOCGameHandler: Dispatches all messages received from the InboundMessageQueue related to specific games (implementing SOCMessageForGame).
    SOCGameTimeoutChecker
    Wakes up every few seconds* to check for turns that have expired by calling SOCServer.checkForExpiredTurns(long), and every 5 minutes to check for games that have expired with SOCServer.checkForExpiredGames(long).
    SOCLocalRobotClient
    Each local robot in the SOCServer gets its own client thread.
    SOCReplaceRequest
    This is a pair of connections, one is sitting at a game and the other is leaving; the arriving connection might be taking over the leaving one's seat.
    SOCServer
    A server for Settlers of Catan
    SOCServerGameOptionSet  
    SOCServerMessageDispatcher
    Server class to dispatch all inbound messages within a SOCServer.
    SOCServerMessageHandler
    Server class to dispatch clients' actions and messages received from the InboundMessageQueue not related to game play in specific current games and not handled by SOCGameMessageHandler.
    SOCServerRobotPinger
    Pings the robots so they know they're connected to an active server.
    SOCServerScenario
    This class holds the known scenarios at the server, in a static dictionary of known scenarios; see SOCServerScenario.cloneAllKnownScenarios() for the current list of all known scenarios.
    StatsFileWriterTask
    Writes a daily *STATS* summary, creating or appending to the file named in SOCServer.PROP_JSETTLERS_STATS_FILE_NAME.
    UnlocalizedString
    Marker for an I18N string to be localized and sent to game members: Key and optional parameters.
